mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.kehu_name as kehuName ,a.kehu_phone as kehuPhone ,a.kehu_id_number as kehuIdNumber ,a.kehu_photo as kehuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto
FROM kehu a left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId}
and a.kehu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuName},'%')
and a.kehu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuPhone},'%')
and a.kehu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
